name: FiMFiction.net - Custom User Toolbar Color
description: A simple little style to force a custom color scheme on the user toolbar.

user.name: ssokolow
user.about: Userstyles.org has a bug which keeps resetting my notification e-mail address. I strongly recommend using the contact form on my blog if you want me to notice. I also sometimes go into more detail about my userstyles on my blog. See the userstyle tag for a list of those.

additional_info:
When using a light background, the button borders will be visible as a color-blended gray.

I'd have implemented it for dark backgrounds too but something about the color-blending is being contrary.
